sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The history of Levvis the eleuenth VVith the most memorable accidents which happened in Europe during the two and twenty yeares of his raigne. Enricht with many obseruations which serue as commentaries. Diuided into eleuen bookes. Written in French by P. Mathieu historiographer to the French King. And translated into English by Edvv: Grimeston Sergeant at Armes Histoire de Louys XI. English Matthieu, Pierre, 1563-1621. Grimeston, Edward. Commynes, Philippe de, ca. 1447-1511.
[16], 232 [i.e. 236], 212, 113-131, [13] p.
Printed by George Eld [and Nicholas Okes], At London : 1614.
A translation of: Histoire de Louys XI. Okes printed quires 3A-4F (STC). The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. "The historie of Lewis the eleuenth. The eighth booke" begins new pagination on 3A1. "Maximes, iudgements, and politike obseruations of Philip de Commines Lord of Argenton" has divisional title page; pagination and register are continuous. P. 236 misnumbered 232. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The history of Levvis the eleuenth VVith the most memorable accidents which happened in Europe during the two and twenty yeares of his raigne. Enricht with many obseruations which serue as commentaries. Diuided into eleuen bookes. Written in French by P. Mathieu historiographer to the French King. And translated into English by Edvv: Grimeston Sergeant at Armes Histoire de Louys XI. English Matthieu, Pierre, 1563-1621. Grimeston, Edward. Commynes, Philippe de, ca. 1447-1511.
[16], 232 [i.e. 236], 212, 113-131, [13] p.
Printed by George Eld [and Nicholas Okes], At London : 1614.
A translation of: Histoire de Louys XI. Okes printed quires 3A-4F (STC). The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. "The historie of Lewis the eleuenth. The eighth booke" begins new pagination on 3A1. "Maximes, iudgements, and politike obseruations of Philip de Commines Lord of Argenton" has divisional title page; pagination and register are continuous. P. 236 misnumbered 232. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

Nicholas Okes]
>>>>>>> imprintparse
